synopsis.text:
Dandelion Troupe, a traveling circus, becomes the new home for the lively and optimistic Nadja, who grew up in an English orphanage. A mysterious package and a letter hint at the possibility that her mother, whom she believed to be dead, might still be alive. As the orphanage is attacked by men in search of her mother's brooch, Nadja embarks on a grand adventure to find her mother and uncover her own identity.

As the 20th century unfolds, Nadja's journey takes her across Europe, escaping her pursuers and seeking answers. With the circus as her sanctuary, she learns that her life may hold more secrets than she ever imagined. Filled with hope and determination, Nadja's exciting quest for the truth begins!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
